values.description:
617 Real Estate provides residential and commercial real estate brokerage services throughout the 617 area code, the Boston area, including home and building sales, apartment rentals, investment consultation, office leases, relocation services, and property management. 

Fusing modern technology and global marketing with old-fashioned people first and localized real estate services, 617 Real Estate hopes to set a new precedent of client-first, world-class service for you and the great city of Boston. Visit our website at www.617RE.com
values.name: 617 Real Estate

values.description:
Use and pay by-the-hour car hire with cars placed near where you work or live. 24 hour 365 day online booking and electronic access to cars.
WhizzGo provides a network of low emission pay-by-the-hour cars across 12 cities in the UK.

LONDON- MANCHESTER-LEEDS-LIVERPOOL-YORK-SHEFFIELD-NEWCASTLE-BIRMINGHAM-BRIGHTON-SOUTHAMPTON-St ALBANS

Once a member, you can book a car in minutes (online or over the phone) for as little as an hour or as long as you need it!

And because you only pay for the time you use a car, you could save up to £3,000 a year against owning your own.

Mission: WhizzGo saves money, hassle and the environment.
values.name: WhizzGo Europe Limited

values.description:
TZO, a Pepperell, MA, based company, was acquired by Dyn, the world leader in Internet Performance Solutions, in September 2012. Dyn is based out of Manchester, NH, with additional locations in Brighton, UK, and San Francisco, CA.

Learn more at www.Dyn.com.

values.description:
responsibletravel.com is the world's leading company for responsible holidays. In 2011 the company celebrates its 10th birthday and has sold $100million worth of holidays since it launched. The site works with over 1,000 tourism suppliers to help market over 7,000 richer, deeper and more locally distinctive travel experiences that are better for destinations and local communities.

Co-founder, Justin Francis launched the site with backing from Dame Anita Roddick in 2001 and since then has been included in Courvoisier’s The Future 500, Thames and Hudson’s 60 Innovators Shaping Our Creative Future and taken his place on the Advisory Board of The International Centre for Responsible Tourism at Leeds Metropolitan University. Based in Brighton, England, responsibletravel.com also campaigns for positive change in the travel and tourism industry. 

Join debates and discussions in our responsible travel and tourism group:
http://www.linkedin.com/groups/Responsible-travel-tourism-3997450
values.name: responsibletravel.com
Ditch the Label
values.description:
Our message is clear: It doesn't matter if you're white, black, gay, straight, asexual, disabled, skinny, curvy, old, young, interested in sports, work in a salon or feel good in drag - we think you're amazing. 

Since 2006 we have been fighting against inequality and promoting the message that it's okay to be different. In fact, difference should be celebrated. We are slowly but surely beginning to touch the hearts of thousands worldwide, capturing a team of loyal supporters and providing community and support to those that need it. 

We are a not-for-profit based in Brighton, UK with enormous ambitions. To find out more about our cause and to get involved visit www.DitchtheLabel.org

values.name: British Study Centres
values.description:
British Study Centres School of English teaches English as a foreign language courses to adults and juniors, providing study vacation courses to over 7500 students from over 90 nationalities in 2013. Its operations consists of four adult year round language schools in London, Oxford, Brighton and Bournemouth and five junior centres in the UK, as well as online video teaching to students all over the world. British Study Centres is a recognised provider of teacher training with two centres in the UK. It was voted the STM Star English Language School Europe for the second time in three years and the STM Star Junior Course provider for under 18s in 2012.

British Study Centres is accredited by the British Council and a member of English UK.

South East Design Forum (previously the South Coast Design Forum) is an independent not-for-profit networking group for designers and other creatives on the south coast between Southampton and Brighton including Winchester and Petersfield with its office in Chichester, West Sussex. SEDF is now expanding into Kent and Surrey.
SEDF now has 400 members drawn from designers of all disciplines and has quickly developed a reputation as one of the leading organisations of its type in the country. 
Peter is the Forum Director reporting to a board chaired by Wayne Hemingway.
values.name: South East Design Forum

values.description:
Central Conveyor Company designs and builds customized material handling systems, storage retrieval systems and automated conveyance solutions. Our conveyors can either be designed and engineered as a stand alone unit or they can be fully integrated with an existing manufacturing line. 

Central Conveyor Company was established in 1993 and has been involved with projects throughout the United States, Canada, Mexico and the United Kingdom. Central Conveyor is headquartered in Brighton, Michigan and we have a southern facility located in Bessemer (Birmingham), Alabama. 

www.centralconveyor.com
values.name: Central Conveyor Company

values.description:
The Diocese of Toronto serves Christ’s mission through compassionate service, intelligent faith, and godly worship. The Diocese was founded in 1839 and is the most populous of the 30 dioceses in the Anglican Church of Canada. Our geographical area extends over 26,000 square kilometres, stretching from Mississauga to Brighton and north to Haliburton. Some 237 congregations in 202 parishes are located in the Diocese.

To connect with us, visit our Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/torontoanglican or follow us on Twitter at @anglicandioTO.

For careers with the Anglican Diocese of Toronto, visit the Careers and Vocations page on our website: http://www.toronto.anglican.ca/about-the-diocese/careers-and-vocations/.
values.name: Anglican Diocese of Toronto

values.description:
Western Nephrology began practice in 1963 serving Lutheran Medical Center and St. Anthony Central Hospitals. In 1973 the practice expanded to provide both inpatient and outpatient dialysis services in the West Denver Metropolitan Region.

Over the next 30 years outpatient dialysis centers were developed in Boulder, Arvada, Brighton, Lakewood, Longmont, and Westminster. In addition inpatient dialysis services were expanded to cover 8 hospitals and 2 rehabilitation hospitals in the Northwest Denver Metropolitan and Boulder area counties. Currently Western Nephrology provides consultative services and inpatient dialysis services to Avista Hospital, Boulder Community Hospital, Colorado Acute Specialty Hospital, Exempla Lutheran Hospital, Exempla Good Samaritan Hospital, Longmont United Hospital, North Suburban Hospital, Vibra, St. Anthony Hospital and St. Anthony North Hospital.

Western Nephrology partners with American Renal Associates as medical directors and attending physicians at 8 regional dialysis clinics as well as a home dialysis program that provides for both home hemodialysis and peritoneal dialysis.

The practice currently includes 17 board certified nephrologists in clinics in Arvada, Lakewood, Boulder, Lafayette, Longmont and Westminster. Research Departments are housed in our Westminster and Arvada Offices. Our administrative office is located in Wheat Ridge and provides credentialing, financial support, and information systems support to the practice.
values.name: Western Nephrology
Amino Transport
values.description:
Amino Transport Inc. is a privately owned freight brokerage company with offices in Hurst TX, Houston TX, San Antonio TX, St Louis MO, Cincinnati OH and Brighton MI.  We broker truckloads of freight nationwide in support of multiple shippers and manufacturers in every industry.  

Our Sales Account Managers have unlimited earning potential in a highly competitive market!
Amino Transport’s culture of reliability, commitment, dependability and innovation relies on our greatest assets, which are our people. 

We are committed to recruiting, training and retaining the best and brightest individuals.  We offer a four-week educational process that includes two weeks of classroom instruction and two weeks of hands on education.  Once formal training completes, each new account manager enters our mentoring program to ensure success.

We are proud to offer our employees:
•	Medical / Dental / Vision
•	401(k)
•	Paid Time Off / Holidays

values.name: PSE Associates
values.description:
Based in Brighton, East Sussex, PSE Associates have unrivalled experience in fast-track development projects in the retail, leisure and hotel industries and are proud to have received several awards for Quantity Surveying excellence from clients.

Our aim continues to be to extend our knowledge and experience within the leisure and other sectors of the building industry, tailoring our professional services to meet the diverse needs of our increasing client base.

We're proud to operate the St Christopher's Inns hostel chain, Belushi's bars and a number of other well known brands and services across Europe including The Flying Pigs, Winston, Mosaic House and Bauhaus.

Beds and Bars is a collective of companies and brands and we’ve been building our fun little empire for a while now. We are made up of St Christopher’s Inns – the largest independent chain of hostels in Europe, Belushi’s Bars, the Winston Hotel and nightclub and the Flying Pig Hostels in Amsterdam, the Bauhaus hotel, bar and hostel in Bruges and Interpub, the traditional pub arm of Beds and Bars.

Our company started back in 1964 with one traditional English Pub. Since then things have changed a bit.

In 1994 the first Belushi's bar opened in Covent Garden. Two years later the first St Christopher's backpacker hostel opened up in Southwark. By 1999 Beds and Bars had 6 Backpacker bars and 350 beds in London. Over the years Beds and Bars has expanded rapidly from a single site to a multi-unit, multinational organisation. Since 1999 we have spread throughout the UK and Europe to Newquay, Bath, Brighton, Edinburgh, Amsterdam, Bruges and Berlin. Paris Canal was our first purpose built hostel and nightclub. The doors opened at the start of 2008. Barcelona in 2012 and our latest baby opened in Gare du Nord, Paris in August 2013.

Proud to be Investors in People Champion since 2010 and winner of the 2013 Best Employer Publican Award
values.name: Beds and Bars Group
Jewish Senior Life of Rochester
values.description:
At Jewish Senior Life™ we offer a full complement of senior services—from a continuing care retirement community, including independent senior living, assisted living and long-term care, to community-based services that enable people to remain in their own homes.
 
Guided by our values of honoring family and helping seniors age well in the place of their choice, we are well known for our dedication to improving the health, well-being, and quality of life of our elders—both on our campus and out in the community. We strive to provide the services you need, when, how and where you need them.
 
Our senior living continuum includes:
 •Independent senior living at The Summit at Brighton
 •Assisted living at Wolk Manor
 •Long-term care, transitional care and memory care at the Jewish Home of Rochester
 
Community-based programs that enable seniors to remain at home, with life enriching services:
 •Adult Day Health Care—a medical model adult day program
 •At Home Services—personal emergency response systems; handyman, housekeeping, lawn care, and meal delivery
 •Companion Services—home help with transportation, cooking, laundry, errands and more
 •Geriatric Care Management—certified geriatric case managers to assist you in finding the right environment or services for your loved one
 •Memory Support—Marian’s House daytime memory retreat and respite
 •Outpatient Rehabilitation—physical, occupational, massage and speech therapy on an outpatient basis
 •Physician House Calls—primary care in the comfort of your own home

Centre Realty Group (CRG) first opened its doors in 1992, where the original focus was on residential sales and rentals. Since then it has continued to expand its services and offerings, and has developed into a leading residential and commercial real estate organization in the  Greater Boston area. Today the firm has expanded to five locations in Newton, Watertown, Brighton, Brookline and West Roxbury.

CV Screen provides cost effective recruitment solutions to a wide range of organisations throughout the UK.

We have a large database of available candidates in your local area and our fees of 12.5% of the basic salary are excellent value within the marketplace.

We also offer a rebate of 100% for the first 100 days to provide you with added security when you are employing a new candidate. Established in 2000, CV Screen has recruited for many of the UK's leading companies and has a proven track record of providing cost effective resourcing solutions to a wide range of clients including GlaxoSmithKline, John Lewis, and Links of London.

We would be very interested to hear from you if you are seeking to recruit throughout the UK or indeed if you are a candidate seeking your next career move. We cover all areas of the UK and have satellite offices in London, Manchester, Birmingham, Edinburgh, Leeds and Brighton.

We have specialist divisions in IT, Marketing, Accountancy, HR, Admin and Secretarial. We also offer access to free services such as our salary survey, job descriptions and skills testing.

For further information, please visit http://www.cvscreen.co.uk or call us on 0845 200 8170.
values.name: CV Screen Ltd

values.description:
HODGES is the only agent in Melbourne that can offer you the wealth of experience and reputation that spans over 150 years since our establishment in 1856.
 
We are recognised as one of Melbourne’s leading Real Estate Agencies with our multiple office network, offering over eighty highly trained and experienced staff who are at your disposal for the best service on offer.
 
Hodges client management is at the forefront of our business and we provide our clients exemplary service thanks to our extensive training program and technology management systems. Communication is critical in all real estate transactions, that is why Hodges has invested in technology and communication channels to ensure that our clients are informed every step of the way.
 
The company expanded through acquisition to establish offices in Bentleigh, Mentone, and South Yarra. In 2006 the Hodges Group was franchised and now has offices in Prahran/South Yarra, St Kilda, Brighton, Bentleigh, Sandringham, Beaumaris, Mentone, Frankston, Chelsea, Mt Eliza and Geelong.
values.name: Hodges Real Estate
